Sentencas: Ammonia is a promising fuel for solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) as it is carbon-free and easy to store at high volumetric energy densities.
Titulo: Thermal management of Ammonia-fed Solid oxide fuel cells using a novel alternate flow interconnector

Sentencas: However, the endothermic decomposition of ammonia in an SOFC stack significantly reduces the temperature at the entrance of the fuel flow, leading to temperature shock and nitriding.
Titulo: Thermal management of Ammonia-fed Solid oxide fuel cells using a novel alternate flow interconnector

Sentencas: Designing a suitable interconnector for the stack to obtain a flatter temperature distribution is an efficient strategy to overcome this problem.
Titulo: Thermal management of Ammonia-fed Solid oxide fuel cells using a novel alternate flow interconnector

Sentencas: This article proposes a novel interconnector design using an alternate flow concept for both fuel and air.
Titulo: Thermal management of Ammonia-fed Solid oxide fuel cells using a novel alternate flow interconnector

Sentencas: A three-dimensional SOFC model was used for the thermal investigation of the proposed design under different operating conditions, including temperature, current, and fuel utilization.
Titulo: Thermal management of Ammonia-fed Solid oxide fuel cells using a novel alternate flow interconnector

Sentencas: The results indicated that the alternate flow design exhibited a 40% lower temperature difference and up to 53 K higher average temperature than a typical cross-flow design.
Titulo: Thermal management of Ammonia-fed Solid oxide fuel cells using a novel alternate flow interconnector

Sentencas: In addition to a flatter temperature profile, the proposed design exhibited a higher ammonia conversion rate than the conventional design, demonstrating its promise for use in robust and efficient ammonia-fed SOFC stacks.
Titulo: Thermal management of Ammonia-fed Solid oxide fuel cells using a novel alternate flow interconnector
